correspondence.message: I am facing a scheduling conflict with two upcoming exams that I must take in order to meet my credit requirements for the semester. What should I do in this situation?"

Unfortunately, you need to choose one exam to participate in due to the overlapping dates. Please send your examination report, enrollment record, and a screenshot of your study plan. If you are near the completion of your degree and facing difficulties, we recommend discussing your situation in detail during our open consultation hours.
